meanings.definition: A flat cake cooked on a griddle.
meanings.sent1: Mom made a delicious griddlecake for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: I love to add syrup to my griddlecake.
meanings.sent3: The griddlecake was so big, it covered the whole plate!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly cooked griddlecake.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the griddlecake filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: Every Sunday, we enjoy a family brunch with griddlecakes.
meanings.sent2: My favorite topping for a griddlecake is blueberries.
meanings.sent3: The griddlecake looked like a golden disc on the plate.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was as light and fluffy as a stack of griddlecakes.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the griddlecake batter hitting the hot surface was music to my ears.
